com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui

Class GuiProgressBar

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.AbstractNode
      • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiContainer
        • com.github.maxstupo.flatengine.hgui.GuiProgressBar

  • public class GuiProgressBar
extends GuiContainer
    This GUI node is a progress bar that allows for both vertical and horizontal display and allows a value between zero and a given max value.
    Author:
    Maxstupo

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected java.awt.Color progressColor
      The color of the progress bar.
      protected java.awt.Color progressOutlineColor
      The color of the outline around the progress bar.
      protected java.awt.Stroke progressOutlineStroke
      The stroke for the outline around the progress bar.
